thread.title: BRIEF-Electrum Strategic Opportunities Fund II L.P. Reports 10.7 pct Passive Stake In International Tower Hill Mines Ltd As Of March 13‍​

title: BRIEF-Electrum Strategic Opportunities Fund II L.P. Reports 10.7 pct Passive Stake In International Tower Hill Mines Ltd As Of March 13‍​
text: Market News March 20, 2018 / 10:40 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Electrum Strategic Opportunities Fund II L.P. Reports 10.7 pct Passive Stake In International Tower Hill Mines Ltd As Of March 13‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - International Tower Hill Mines Ltd: * ELECTRUM STRATEGIC OPPORTUNITIES FUND II L.P. REPORTS 10.7 PERCENT PASSIVE STAKE IN INTERNATIONAL TOWER HILL MINES LTD AS OF MARCH 13, 2018 - SEC FILING ‍​ Source text - ( bit.ly/2u4wb9P ) Further company coverage:
